com.salesmanager.shop.application

Class ShopApplicationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
      • com.salesmanager.shop.application.ShopApplicationConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurer

    @Configuration
 @ComponentScan(value={"com.salesmanager.shop","com.salesmanager.core.business"})
 @EnableAutoConfiguration
 @Import(value=com.salesmanager.core.business.configuration.CoreApplicationConfiguration.class)
 @ImportResource(value="classpath:/spring/shopizer-shop-context.xml")
 @EnableWebSecurity
public class ShopApplicationConfiguration
extends org.springframework.web.servlet.config.annotation.WebMvcConfigurerAdapter
